mapper.select: select b2.id id,b2.STRBRANCHNUM strBranchNum,b2.STRBRANCHNAME strBranchName,b1.STRBANKNUM strBankNum,b1.STRBANKNAME strBankName from z_bank b1,z_branch b2 where b2.STRBANKNUM = b1.STRBANKNUM

select b3.id id,b3.STRSUBBRANCHNUM strSubBranchNum,b3.STRSUBBRANCHNAME strSubBranchName, b2.STRBRANCHNUM strBranchNum,b2.STRBRANCHNAME strBranchName, b1.STRBANKNUM strBankNum,b1.STRBANKNAME strBankName from z_bank b1,z_branch b2,z_subbranch b3 where b2.STRBANKNUM = b1.STRBANKNUM and b3.STRBRANCHNUM = b2.STRBRANCHNUM

select b4.id id,b4.STRSSBNUM strSsbNum,b4.STRSSBNAME strSsbName, b3.STRSUBBRANCHNUM strSubBranchNum,b3.STRSUBBRANCHNAME strSubBranchName, b2.STRBRANCHNUM strBranchNum,b2.STRBRANCHNAME strBranchName, b1.STRBANKNUM strBankNum,b1.STRBANKNAME strBankName from z_bank b1,z_branch b2,z_subbranch b3,z_selfsvcbank b4 where b2.STRBANKNUM = b1.STRBANKNUM and b3.STRBRANCHNUM = b2.STRBRANCHNUM and b4.STRSUBBRANCHNUM = b3.STRSUBBRANCHNUM
